content.text:
# Dallas–Fort Worth Film Critics Association Awards 1995

The 2nd Dallas-Fort Worth Film Critics Association Awards, given in 1996, honored the best filmmaking of 1995.
Winners
*Best Actor:
**Nicolas Cage and Elisabeth Shue - Leaving Las Vegas
*Best Director:
**Mike Figgis - Leaving Las Vegas
*Best Foreign Language Film:
**Les Misérables
*Best Picture:
**Leaving Las Vegas
*Best Supporting Actor:
**Kevin Spacey - The Usual Suspects
*Best Supporting Actress:
**Mira Sorvino - Mighty Aphrodite
*Worst Film:
**Showgirls
References
External links
*[http://www.dfwcritics.com Dallas-Fort Worth Film Critics Association official website]
